meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of this <radical>valley</radical> is very <kanji>vulgar</kanji>. The name of the valley is Vulgar Valley, so it makes sense for its leader to be very vulgar.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>vulgar</kanji> leader leads his Boso<reading>zoku</reading> (ぞく) bike gang through Vulgar Valley, patrolling the area and spreading vulgarity as he goes.
